fg_segments: Your privacy is important to us. To better protect your privacy we provide this notice explaining our online information practices and the choices you can make about the way your information is collected and used.
To make this notice easy to find, we make it available on our homepage and at every point where personally identifiable information may be requested.
We do not collect any customer information. Please see our payment processor's Privacy Policy concerning collected information.

raw_html:
Privacy Policy







Privacy Policy

Our Commitment To Privacy

        Your privacy is important to us. To better protect your privacy we provide this notice explaining our online information practices and the choices you 
        can make about the way your information is collected and used. To make this notice easy to find, we make it available on our homepage and at every point 
        where personally identifiable information may be requested. 


        We do not collect any customer information. Please see our payment processor's Privacy Policy concerning collected information.
